sources.name: TweetSource
sources.script:
source(output(
		TweetDate as string,
		TweetTime as string,
		TweetAuthor as string,
		TweetText as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> TweetSource

transformations.name: RankTweets
transformations.script:
CountTweets window(over(Category),
	desc(TweetCount, true),
	tweet_rank = rank(TweetCount)) ~> RankTweets

transformations.name: CountTweets
transformations.script:
DefineCategories aggregate(groupBy(TweetAuthor,
		Category),
	TweetCount = sum(1)) ~> CountTweets
